t: Our Help Is in the Name of the Lord
A Song of Ascents. Of David.
If*pn it had not been the Lord*s who was on our side— let*ld Israel now say—
if*ln it had not been the Lord*s who was on our side when*ld people rose up against us,
then*ln they would have swallowed us up alive, when*ld their anger was kindled against us;
then*ln the flood would have swept us away, the*ld torrent would have gone over us;
then*ln over us would have gone the*ld raging waters.
Blessed*pn be the Lord,*s who*ld has not given us as*ld prey to their teeth!
We*ln have escaped like a bird from*ld the snare of the fowlers; the*ln snare is broken, and*ld we have escaped!
Our*pn help is in the name of the Lord,*s who*ld made heaven and earth.
